title: Suspicious Email Traits
content: Urgent tone, threats, spelling errors, unknown sender, mismatched display name vs address.

title: Links & Domain Tricks
content: Hover to preview URLs. Lookalikes like paypa1.com or odd subdomains are malicious.

title: Attachments
content: Unexpected ZIP/EXE/HTML attachments can deliver malware. Verify with the sender.

title: Requests for Credentials
content: Legit companies will not ask for passwords, 2FA codes, or banking PINs over email.

title: If You Clicked
content: Disconnect, change password, enable MFA, run a malware scan, and inform support/security.
